extDescription.message: Displays the robots.txt and humans.txt for any website.

popupHeader.description: The heading text on the popup window, containing the robot and human images

reload.description: Text on the button to reload the robots.txt and humans.txt files

reloading.description: Text to show when the files are being reloaded

reloadTooltip.message: Reload the robots.txt and humans.txt files
reloadTooltip.description: The tooltip to show when hovering over the reload button

about.description: The title of the about tab

reset.description: Text to show on the fight button to reset the fight

draw.description: The message to show when the fight ends in a draw

robotsWin.description: The message to show when the robots win the fight

robotsWinDefault.description: The message to show when the robots win because there is no humans.txt

humansWin.description: The message to show when the humans win the fight

humansWinDefault.description: The message to show when the humans win because there is no robots.txt

noWinner.message: No one turned up to the fight :(
noWinner.description: The message to show when there is no robots.txt or humans.txt

fighting.description: The message shown whilst the fight is in progress

fileNotFound.description: The message to show when a file is not found

optionsSettings.description: Message telling users that settings are saved automatically

optionsStatisticsLabel.description: The label for the send anonymous usage statistics checkbox

optionsStatisticsHelp.message: Information collected contains no personal information and is used solely for the purpose of improving this extension by seeing which sections and features are used
optionsStatisticsHelp.description: Message explaining how the anonymous usage statistics is used

updateNotification.message: Robots vs Humans has been updated to version $VERSION$!
updateNotification.description: Notification telling the user the extension has been updates

installNotification.message: Thank you for installing Robots vs Humans!
installNotification.description: Notification telling the user the extension has been installed
